Do not seek <S%H1245><s%> [them;] for behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to bring <S%H935><s%> disaster <S%H9567><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'but I will give <S%H5414><s%> your life <S%H5315><s%> to you as booty <S%H7998><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the places <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you may go. <S%H1980><s%>' "
